ygData.subject: Re: pets and weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: No there is not a way and it is done on purpose so you WON T give them good weapons.  Also after 12th they are purely cosmetic and add non to damage.
ygData.messageBody:
No there is not a way and it is done on purpose so you WON'T give them good
weapons. Also after 12th they are purely cosmetic and add non to damage.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Sagi Shechter [SMTP:sagis@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 5:16 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] pets and weapons

From: Sagi Shechter <sagis@...>

Hi everyone,

Does anybody know if there is a way for you to take back a weapon you give
to your pet to wield? after i give some weapon to my pet, i cant take it
back when i want to zone, so the weapon gets lost.
Does anyone else think that the current system where when your pet dies all
of the stuff you gave it just vanish, is not too good? For me at least, it
causes not to hand out expensive weapons to my pet, because i know i will
not be able to get it back, so i prefer to sell it in the shop, and but
something less expensive as a "disposable" weapon.
Opinions?

Trenzorian / Tunare
